introduction: A brand new series from the production team of Discovering Film and Discovering Rock Legends. The first six episodes look at the highlights and impact of some the world’s greatest, ground breaking and influential designers of the 20th Century. Including legends Coco Chanel, Yves Saint Laurent and Valentino. Featuring contributions from the UK’s leading fashion writers and journalists we find out the stories behind these characters who lay the foundation for modern fashion we experience today.EPISODE 01 — GIVENCHYEPISODE 02 — YVES SAINT LAURENTEPISODE 03 — DIOREPISODE 04 — CHANELEPISODE 05 – TOM FORDEPISODE 06 – VALENTINO
